general.name: The Bath House
general.footer: To purchase an item, type !buy 1 item. Items can also be sold back to Izzie for 1/3 its original price using !sell 1 item. You can set the quantity.

halloween.name: The Bath House - Halloween Special!
halloween.description: Items can only be purchased with candy.
halloween.footer: To purchase an item, type !buy 1 item. You can set the quantity. Items bought here will not be refunded.

holiday.name: The Bath House - Holiday Special!
holiday.description: Items can only be purchased with snowflakes.
holiday.footer: To purchase an item, type !buy 1 item. You can set the quantity. Items bought here will not be refunded.

valentines.name: The Bath House - Valentine Special!
valentines.description: Items can only be purchased with sweethearts.
valentines.footer: To purchase an item, type !buy 1 item. You can set the quantity. Items bought here will not be refunded.
